name: UActorComponent

PrimaryComponentTick: Main tick function for the Component
ComponentTags: Array of tags that can be used for grouping and categorizing. Can also be accessed from scripting.
AssetUserData: Array of user data stored with the component
AssetUserDataEditorOnly: Array of user data stored with the component
OnComponentActivated: Called when the component has been activated, with parameter indicating if it was from a reset
OnComponentDeactivated: Called when the component has been deactivated
bReplicateUsingRegisteredSubObjectList:
When true the replication system will only replicate the registered subobjects list
When false the replication system will instead call the virtual ReplicateSubObjects() function where the subobjects need to be manually replicated.
bReplicates: Is this component currently replicating? Should the network code consider it for replication? Owning Actor must be replicating first!
bAutoActivate: Whether the component is activated at creation or must be explicitly activated.
bEditableWhenInherited: True if this component can be modified when it was inherited from a parent actor class
bCanEverAffectNavigation: Whether this component can potentially influence navigation
bIsEditorOnly: If true, the component will be excluded from non-editor builds

methods.name: Activate
methods.doc:
Activates the SceneComponent, should be overridden by native child classes.
@param bReset - Whether the activation should happen even if ShouldActivate returns false.

methods.name: AddTickPrerequisiteActor
methods.doc: Make this component tick after PrerequisiteActor

methods.name: AddTickPrerequisiteComponent
methods.doc: Make this component tick after PrerequisiteComponent.

methods.name: ComponentHasTag
methods.doc: See if this component contains the supplied tag

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.doc: Deactivates the SceneComponent.

methods.name: GetComponentTickInterval
methods.doc: Returns the tick interval for this component's primary tick function, which is the frequency in seconds at which it will be executed

methods.name: GetOwner
methods.doc: Follow the Outer chain to get the  AActor  that 'Owns' this component

methods.name: IsActive
methods.doc:
Returns whether the component is active or not
@return - The active state of the component.

methods.name: IsBeingDestroyed
methods.doc: Returns whether the component is in the process of being destroyed.

methods.name: IsComponentTickEnabled
methods.doc: Returns whether this component has tick enabled or not

methods.name: DestroyComponent
methods.doc: Unregister and mark for pending kill a component.  This may not be used to destroy a component that is owned by an actor unless the owning actor is calling the function.

methods.name: AsyncPhysicsTick
methods.doc: Event called every async physics tick if bAsyncPhysicsTickEnabled is true

methods.name: BeginPlay
methods.doc:
Blueprint implementable event for when the component is beginning play, called before its owning actor's BeginPlay
or when the component is dynamically created if the Actor has already BegunPlay.

methods.name: EndPlay
methods.doc: Blueprint implementable event for when the component ends play, generally via destruction or its Actor's EndPlay.

methods.name: Tick
methods.doc: Event called every frame if tick is enabled

methods.name: RemoveTickPrerequisiteActor
methods.doc: Remove tick dependency on PrerequisiteActor.

methods.name: RemoveTickPrerequisiteComponent
methods.doc: Remove tick dependency on PrerequisiteComponent.

methods.name: SetActive
SetAutoActivate
methods.doc:
Sets whether the component should be auto activate or not. Only safe during construction scripts.
@param bNewAutoActivate - The new auto activate state of the component

methods.name: SetComponentTickEnabled
methods.doc:
Set this component's tick functions to be enabled or disabled. Only has an effect if the function is registered

@param       bEnabled - Whether it should be enabled or not

methods.name: SetComponentTickInterval
methods.doc:
Sets the tick interval for this component's primary tick function. Does not enable the tick interval. Takes effect on next tick.
@param TickInterval   The duration between ticks for this component's primary tick function

methods.name: SetComponentTickIntervalAndCooldown
methods.doc:
Sets the tick interval for this component's primary tick function. Does not enable the tick interval. Takes effect imediately.
@param TickInterval   The duration between ticks for this component's primary tick function

methods.name: SetIsReplicated
methods.doc: Enable or disable replication. This is the equivalent of RemoteRole for actors (only a bool is required for components)

methods.name: SetTickableWhenPaused
methods.doc: Sets whether this component can tick when paused.

methods.name: SetTickGroup
methods.doc: Changes the ticking group for this component

methods.name: ToggleActive
methods.doc: Toggles the active state of the component
